title: Khadour Details
text:

We offer 100% mobile detailing services for maximum convenience, bringing everything needed to your location‚Äîwhether you‚Äôre at work, home, or on vacation ‚Äî your car can be detailed while you relax.¬†

title: Professional Summary
Objection Handling Strategies
text: Effectively handling objections is critical to advancing the sales conversation. In this project, I applied multiple strategies‚Äîincluding the Feel-Felt-Found method, clarification questioning, and value reframing‚Äîto address common buyer concerns such as price, risk, and timing.

title: Objection Handling Strategies
text: Effectively handling objections is critical to advancing the sales conversation. In this project, I applied multiple strategies‚Äîincluding the Feel-Felt-Found method, clarification questioning, and value reframing‚Äîto address common buyer concerns such as price, risk, and timing.

title: Objection Handling Strategies
text:
Techniques Used

Feel-Felt-Found: Built empathy while reframing concerns with past customer success stories

Clarification & Probing: Asked follow-up questions to uncover the root of objections

ROI Framing: Linked the solution‚Äôs cost to measurable outcomes and long-term value

Third-Party Proof: Used case studies and testimonials to reduce perceived risk

Trial Closes: Confirmed buyer readiness after addressing concerns

title: Objection Handling Strategies
text:
Practice Scenarios

VONS Buyer Meeting (Ryze Superfoods): Addressed price objection by emphasizing health trend alignment, profit per unit, and marketing support

Sales Simulation Roleplay: Reframed ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre happy with our current supplier‚Äù by differentiating service, reliability, and added benefits

Cold Call Follow-Up: Turned ‚ÄúNow‚Äôs not a good time‚Äù into a scheduled demo using empathy and value recap

title: Objection Handling Strategies
text:
Takeaways
This experience taught me that objections are not rejections‚Äîthey‚Äôre buying signals in disguise. With the right mindset and method, I can turn resistance into opportunity and move the sale forward with confidence.


‚ÄúAn objection handled well is a step closer to a ‚Äòyes.‚Äô‚Äù

title: Sales Tools & Collateral
text:
Great selling is powered by the right tools. In this project, I created and refined sales collateral to support value communication, objection handling, and buyer engagement throughout the sales cycle. Each asset was tailored to the customer‚Äôs needs and aligned with the overall messaging strategy.
From polished presentations to compelling proposals and persuasive one-pagers, these materials helped reinforce verbal messages and added professionalism and structure to the sales process.

title: Sales Tools & Collateral
text:
Great selling is powered by the right tools. In this project, I created and refined sales collateral to support value communication, objection handling, and buyer engagement throughout the sales cycle. Each asset was tailored to the customer‚Äôs needs and aligned with the overall messaging strategy.
From polished presentations to compelling proposals and persuasive one-pagers, these materials helped reinforce verbal messages and added professionalism and structure to the sales process.

title: Sales Tools & Collateral
text:
Tools & Deliverables

Sales Presentation Decks: Visual aids used in buyer meetings to highlight product features, benefits, and differentiators

Proposal Templates: Structured documents outlining pricing, ROI analysis, and terms in a clear, compelling format

Objection Handling Sheets: Quick-reference guides for common objections with recommended responses and proof points

Call Scripts & Email Templates: Pre-call planning sheets and follow-up email frameworks to ensure consistent communication

Product Sheets & One-Pagers: Clean, concise overviews of offerings tailored to specific buyer personas

title: Sales Tools & Collateral
text:
Sample Use Cases

Ryze Superfoods B2B Pitch Deck: Created a visually engaging, data-supported presentation for a bulk coffee sales pitch to VONS

Email Follow-up Template: Sent after discovery calls, reinforcing key benefits and offering additional resources

ROI Summary Sheet: Designed to simplify pricing objections by highlighting long-term cost savings and competitive margins

title: Sales Tools & Collateral
text:
Value Gained
By building these tools, I learned how to communicate complex information simply and persuasively. These materials not only made my conversations more effective, but also helped buyers feel more confident in their decisions.


‚ÄúSales tools don‚Äôt just inform‚Äîthey build trust, shorten cycles, and move deals forward.‚Äù

title: Sales Dialogues & Presentations
text: This project showcases my ability to design and deliver professional sales dialogues using structured frameworks such as SPIN Selling, FAB (Features-Advantages-Benefits), and Value-Based Selling. I practiced both scripted and adaptive dialogue approaches in live simulations and internships.

title: Sales Dialogues & Presentations
text: This project showcases my ability to design and deliver professional sales dialogues using structured frameworks such as SPIN Selling, FAB (Features-Advantages-Benefits), and Value-Based Selling. I practiced both scripted and adaptive dialogue approaches in live simulations and internships.

title: Sales Dialogues & Presentations
text:
Key Skills Applied

Customer needs analysis through Situation and Problem questions

Communicating value with Need-Payoff and Confirmed Benefits

Supporting claims using verbal proof, visual aids, and testimonials

Handling objections with empathy and evidence

Closing with summary benefit statements and trial closes

title: Sales Dialogues & Presentations
text:
Examples Included

Cold Call Simulation: Opened with rapport, uncovered pain points, positioned solution benefits, and handled early resistance.

In-Person Sales Pitch at VONS (Ryze Coffee): Prepared a needs-based presentation that emphasized profit margin, customer trends, and product uniqueness.

Uline Internship Call Planning Template: Created structured talk tracks and follow-ups based on customer data and prior call outcomes.

title: Sales Dialogues & Presentations
text:
Outcomes
These exercises strengthened my confidence, adaptability, and clarity in customer conversations. I gained real-world insight into the balance between preparation and flexibility, especially when responding to buyer concerns on the spot.

title: Hi, I‚Äôm Jaffer
text: Aspiring marketing professional with a strong foundation in professional selling, consumer behavior, and data-driven strategy. Seeking to leverage hands-on experience in B2B sales, CRM systems, and product authentication to contribute to innovative brand growth and customer engagement strategies. Passionate about turning insights into action and delivering measurable results in dynamic marketing environments.

title: Hi, I‚Äôm Jaffer
text:
About Me
I hold a Bachelor‚Äôs in Marketing Management from Cal Poly Pomona.(est. graduation date: May 2026) with an emphasis in Professional Selling. In addition to my sales skills, I‚Äôve developed strong analytical capabilities through marketing research projects using tools like R, Quarto, and ggplot2. Whether it‚Äôs visualizing data, crafting brand messages, or closing a deal, I approach every task with curiosity, preparation, and a growth mindset. I also have a business that I recently started with my brother, and am very passionate for customer satisfaction and auto detailing.

title: Hi, I‚Äôm Jaffer
text:
Highlighted Achievements

Sales Intern at Uline: Supported regional sales strategy and CRM outreach using Salesforce; contributed to a 12% increase in qualified leads
Authentication Specialist at GOAT: Maintained 100% accuracy authenticating high-value sneakers and reduced fraud risk through detailed inspections
Academic Recognition: Member of Beta Gamma Sigma with 4.0 GPA
Marketing Projects: Conducted behavioral research on COVID-era consumer habits; cleaned and analyzed survey data using R, ggplot2, and Quarto
Leadership in Safety: Trained over 100 associates at Amazon on social distancing protocols, contributing to a 30% reduction in safety violations

title: Hi, I‚Äôm Jaffer
text:
Let‚Äôs Connect
You can email me or connect on LinkedIn.

Welcome to my portfolio.

title: Campaign Reflections
text:
Campaigns are where strategy meets execution. In this project, I reflect on my experience designing and delivering sales campaigns‚Äîboth in-class simulations and real-world internships. These reflections helped me internalize what works, what doesn‚Äôt, and how to continuously improve my approach to selling.
Each campaign taught me valuable lessons about messaging, timing, buyer engagement, follow-ups, and adapting when results didn‚Äôt meet expectations.

title: Campaign Reflections
text:
Campaigns are where strategy meets execution. In this project, I reflect on my experience designing and delivering sales campaigns‚Äîboth in-class simulations and real-world internships. These reflections helped me internalize what works, what doesn‚Äôt, and how to continuously improve my approach to selling.
Each campaign taught me valuable lessons about messaging, timing, buyer engagement, follow-ups, and adapting when results didn‚Äôt meet expectations.

title: Campaign Reflections
text:
Key Lessons Learned

Know Your Buyer: Tailoring messaging to the customer‚Äôs industry, goals, and pain points is essential for engagement

Follow-Up is Everything: A well-timed and personalized follow-up can make the difference between interest and action

Metrics Drive Strategy: Data from each campaign (e.g., response rates, conversions, objections) guided my next steps

Flexibility Matters: No plan survives first contact‚Äîadapting mid-campaign is a core skill

Team Collaboration: Working with peers in group sales projects highlighted the value of coordination, shared goals, and role clarity

title: Campaign Reflections
text:
Campaign Examples

Ryze Coffee B2B Sales Campaign: Targeted VONS buyers with tailored messaging around consumer wellness trends and profitability

Cold Calling Sprint (Uline Internship): Planned outreach sequence, tracked conversion KPIs, and adapted scripts based on live feedback

Course-Based Simulation: Developed an end-to-end campaign for a hypothetical SaaS product, including prospecting plan, sales materials, and objection handling strategy

title: Campaign Reflections
text:
Takeaways
These experiences helped me develop a mindset of continuous improvement. I now approach campaigns not just as sales efforts‚Äîbut as experiments in communication, psychology, and value creation.


‚ÄúEvery campaign is a classroom‚Äîif you‚Äôre paying attention.‚Äù

title: Customer Needs Discovery
text:
Understanding customer needs is the foundation of any successful sale. In this project, I applied consultative selling principles‚Äîespecially SPIN Selling‚Äîto uncover the buyer‚Äôs situation, problems, implications, and needs-payoff expectations.
I focused on asking the right questions, actively listening, and connecting customer pain points to solution benefits, whether in roleplays, class simulations, or internship-based scenarios.

title: Customer Needs Discovery
text:
Understanding customer needs is the foundation of any successful sale. In this project, I applied consultative selling principles‚Äîespecially SPIN Selling‚Äîto uncover the buyer‚Äôs situation, problems, implications, and needs-payoff expectations.
I focused on asking the right questions, actively listening, and connecting customer pain points to solution benefits, whether in roleplays, class simulations, or internship-based scenarios.

title: Customer Needs Discovery
text:
Techniques Used

SPIN Selling Framework: Structured discovery using Situation, Problem, Implication, and Need-Payoff questions

Active Listening: Paraphrased buyer responses to ensure accuracy and build trust

Probing & Clarifying: Dug deeper into surface-level answers to uncover true motivations

Benefit Alignment: Connected uncovered needs directly to product or service features

Emotional & Rational Drivers: Identified both personal and business goals behind objections or hesitations

title: Customer Needs Discovery
text:
Sample Scenarios

Consultative Roleplay: Discovered a buyer‚Äôs dissatisfaction with support from a competitor, leading to positioning our solution‚Äôs superior service model

Ryze Buyer Discovery Call: Identified the VP‚Äôs need to attract health-conscious millennials and reduce slow-moving inventory

Customer Profile Planning (Uline Internship): Used customer data and previous call history to personalize questions and pitch

title: Customer Needs Discovery
text:
Key Learning
Customer needs aren‚Äôt always stated‚Äîthey must be surfaced. By taking the time to deeply understand each buyer‚Äôs goals, challenges, and context, I‚Äôve learned to position solutions that truly resonate and build long-term trust.


‚ÄúPeople don‚Äôt buy products. They buy solutions to their problems.‚Äù

title: Professional Selling
text:
Below are selected projects and experiences that showcase my development in professional selling. These examples reflect my ability to apply structured sales techniques, customer-focused strategies, and business acumen in a real-world setting.
From cold calls to closing, objection handling to relationship building, my work is rooted in understanding buyer needs, creating value, and driving results.

title: Professional Selling
text:
What You‚Äôll Find

Sales Dialogues & Presentations: Demonstrations of structured, consultative conversations aligned with SPIN and value-based selling frameworks.

Objection Handling: Real-world examples where I overcame buyer resistance and secured commitment.

Customer Needs Discovery: How I identify buyer motives and align solutions to their pain points.

Sales Tools & Collateral: Custom materials like presentations, proposals, and call scripts used to support the sales process.

Campaign Reflections: Reflections from sales simulations, internships, or coursework.

Each project offers insight into how I‚Äôve grown as a sales professional‚Äîand how I continue to refine my approach to delivering value in every customer interaction.
